zh: 我是一名熱愛學習新技術的工程師，研究所時期以研究AI影像處理為主，而在過去的工作中從事SSD控制晶片韌體開發，主要解決PCIe跟NVMe相關的host端問題，並熟悉軟硬體整合。
目前想轉職為一名軟體工程師，在一年的gap year中，除了練習LeetCode之外，我自主學習了 DevOps 技術與自動化流程，像是 Docker、K8s、Terraform 以及 CI/CD 流程等等，並且學以致用了幾個實用的專案，不僅可以幫助自己解決自身需求，還能夠精進自己的技術。
en: I am an engineer who is passionate about learning new technologies. During my graduate studies, my research focused on AI image processing. In my previous role, I worked on SSD controller firmware development, primarily handling host-side issues related to PCIe and NVMe, and I am familiar with hardware-software integration.

Currently, I am looking to transition into a career as a software engineer. During my one-year gap year, in addition to practicing LeetCode, I have self-studied DevOps technologies and automation workflows, such as Docker, K8s, Terraform, and CI/CD processes. I have also applied what I’ve learned to several practical projects, which not only help solve my own needs but also allow me to refine my technical skills.

title.zh: SSD 韌體工程師 - 群聯電子
title.en: SSD Firmware Engineer - Phison Electronics Corp

zh.main: 開發首款 SSD E31 PCIe/NVMe Gen5 SSD 韌體架構。
sub: 開發 E31 Gen5 SSD controller 的 PCIe initialization flow，處理軟硬整合使 link 可以達到 Gen5 並且維持穩定。
基於客戶需求，設計與實作客製化的 host 端 firmware features。
優化 low-level system sequences，例如 power-on and reset latencies 等等，來滿足 OEM 效能需求。

zh: 開發 ARM-based 的 PCIe/NVMe Gen3/4/5 SSDs firmware，並且熟悉 interrupt handling、memory management、power management 以及 DMA 等等技術。
透過 log analysis、code tracing、使用 UEFI scripts 做 SoC verification、logic analyzers、GPIO 以及 UART 等技術來做 firmware debugging。
專精於 PCIe and NVMe spec 並且使用 Protocol Analyzer (Viavi, LeCroy) 來解決 host 端跨平台的相容性問題。
有經驗於跨部門合作以及出差至客戶端 on-site 支援。

en.main: Developed the first SSD E31 PCIe/NVMe Gen5 SSD Firmware Architecture.
sub: Developed the PCIe initialization flow for the E31 Gen5 SSD controller, ensuring seamless hardware-software integration and achieving stable Gen5 link performance.
Designed and implemented customized host-side firmware features based on customer requirements.
Optimized low-level system sequences, including power-on and reset latencies, to improve system responsiveness and meet stringent OEM performance requirements.

en: Developed ARM-based firmware for PCIe/NVMe Gen3/4/5 SSDs, specializing in interrupt handling, memory management, power management, and DMA.
Performed full-stack firmware debugging through log analysis, code tracing, SoC verification using UEFI scripts, logic analyzers, GPIO, and UART.
Proficient in PCIe and NVMe specifications and resolved host-side compatibility issues across various platforms by using Protocol Analyzer (Viavi, LeCroy).
Collaborated cross-functionally and delivered on-site technical support at client locations.

title.zh: 國立臺灣大學 (NTU) - 工程科學與海洋工程研究所 碩士
title.en: National Taiwan University (NTU) - Master of Engineering

zh: 實驗室：計算生醫工程實驗室
論文：結合紋理特徵之多視角殘差選擇核網路應用於肺結節分類
en: Thesis: Multiview residual selective kernel networks for lung nodule classification associated with texture features.

zh: 提出新的 AI 模型架構，並結合紋理特徵，來優化肺結節分類的準確度。
en: Proposed a novel AI model architecture integrating texture feature extraction to optimize lung nodule classification accuracy.

schools.stack: Tech Stack: Python, Pytorch, MATLAB, Deep Learning, Image Processing, Image Classification

title.zh: 國立臺灣師範大學 (NTNU) - 地球科學系 學士
title.en: National Taiwan Normal University (NTNU) - Bachelor of Science

title.zh: Web 框架與其他軟體技能

desc.zh: 製作一個靜態網頁，先包成 Docker image，再透過 Terraform 到 Hetzner 開一個 VM 來跑 k8s，最後使用 k8s 跑 Docker image 來架站。
desc.en: Create a static website, package it into a Docker image, and then use Terraform to provision a VM on Hetzner to run K8s. Finally, use K8s to run the Docker image to host the website.

items.stack: Tech Stack: Docker, Terraform, K8s, Hetzner, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

title.zh: 每日 AI 自動化財經新聞電子報

desc.zh: 開發全自動化的雲原生系統，利用 Docker 和 AWS 協調網路爬蟲、AI 驅動的新聞摘要和音訊生成。利用 n8n 工作流程透過電子郵件發送最終報告和 Podcast。
desc.en: Developed a fully automated cloud-native system utilizing Docker and AWS to orchestrate web scraping, AI-driven financial news summarization, and audio generation, leveraging n8n workflows for delivery via email.

items.stack: Tech Stack: Python, Selenium, BeautifulSoup, Requests, AWS, Docker, n8n, Google Gemini API, Azure AI Speech API

title.zh: 智慧夜生活導航與活動 LINE Bot
title.en: Smart Nightlife Navigator & Event Companion LINE Bot

desc.zh: 使用 Docker、Render 和 UptimeRobot 建立穩定的 LINE Bot，整合 Google Maps API 自動探索飲酒場所並主持隨機飲酒遊戲。
desc.en: Built a stable LINE Bot using Docker, Render, and UptimeRobot that integrates Google Maps API to automate the discovery of drinking venues and host random drinking games.

items.stack: Tech Stack: Python, Flask, Webhook, Google Maps API, Docker, Render

title.zh: FUSE 使用者空間檔案系統實作

desc.zh: 使用 C++17 模擬經典 Unix 架構（類 EXT2）設計了一個持久性檔案系統。利用 Superblock、Inode Tables 和 Bitmap 分配進行高效的中繼資料管理。使用 std::mutex 和 Monitor Pattern 強制執行執行緒安全，消除競爭條件。
desc.en: Engineered a persistent file system in C++17 simulating classic Unix architecture (EXT2-like). Enforced thread safety for concurrent operations using std::mutex, effectively eliminating race conditions during resource allocation.

items.stack: Tech Stack: C++17, C, Bash, FUSE (libfuse3), POSIX API
